name: C S
text: Love this place!  If you like LOTS of stuff on your pizza,  the $10 unlimited toppings deal is AWESOME.  The staff is always super nice and you get to pick what you like.  The are always quick. â€¦More

name: Tofu Man
text: Very conveniently located at a plaza for easy parking. This place does have large indoor seating. The pizza ingredients look fresh and it also tasted good too. What I really like about their menu is the 1/2 pizza & side salad combo. You get to enjoy eating pizza with half the guilt.

name: Rosemary Valenzo
text: Wonderful experience. Convenient parking and clean location. Staff was friendly. Plenty of lemonade options. Will definitely be back and itâ€™s was reasonably priced . The only negative thing I can say is the ranch dressing taste store bought .

name: Austin Harbour
text: Gave a really good tip was very impressed on how much toppings they put on the pizza and it taste amazing I really enjoyed this.

name: Emm Gee
text: Amazing!! Get the Veg Out with extra gorgonzola and yellow peppers and any additional veggies!! Don't forget the sauce dallops! Amazing!!

name: Steven martinez
text: I wanted some pizza so I googled the closest blaze Pizza around me, this happened to be the closest. I went in and saw they were using the wooden pizza paddles without washing them after every use and thought they were skipping steps, I â€¦More

name: Wendy Garrity-Pelletier
text: First time ordering from Blaze Pizza. Super disappointed! We ordered based on the great ratings and reviews, so we were quite surprised by our experience. We ordered two Large Pepperoni Pizzas. We received two very burned pizzas, with the â€¦More

name: Paul Lin
text: Build your own pizza with all toppings you can have and no extra charge! Fast cooking too! Great lemonades! You will be happy here!

name: Alicia Hielckert
text: Yum is all I can say. Tastes great, fresh and healthy. We did half red vine and half Spicy, the spicy red says is a great add to any pizza! You can get half a pizza and a salad for 10. Can't wait to go back!

name: Kazz TV
text: Friggin love this place. Always get your personal pizzas in 5 minutes, and the ingredients they use are so fresh. They offer different crust options like Keto or Cauliflower, and you can add a sauce drizzle at the end for additional flavor :)

name: Jennifer Ann Lee

text: Make your own for $11.00

name: Carlos Batista
text: Ordered a pizza. Waited 20 minutes. And all of a sudden, my pizza disappeared. The manager was unable to make it up. No expectations when all your employees are teenagers including the manager. A credit or discount for the lack of good service given to a regular paying customer is just fair (and not a big deal anyways).

text: Blaze pizza is fantastic. The Keto Crust is a game changer, great option for a low carb pizza.

text: Inside design is modern, love it! Pizza tastes great! Crews/Staff need to be more friendly and smile more! But over-all had a great time visiting Blaze!

name: Krishna Narasimhan
text: Nice place where you can customize your pizza. Fresh ingredients and good tasting pizza. Good location with easy and plenty parking. They have half pizzas, interesting option though Iâ€™ve never tried. The staff behind the counter are good and helpful.

text: The service by the staff was great. Friendly and helpful for my first time. But food was just ok. More hype than quality

text: This one is a little slow.... Failed to ensure order was called out clearly ajd5 made it to the customer. I was sitting their 15 minutes and had to ask if the order was ready.

name: Johnny B
text: New location here in south coast metro made with crispier crust and not burnt the way thin crust should be. **Update 12/2019 - worse Blaze location.  Lady can't cut a pizza properly.  Provided feedback multiple times on the app, but nothing was ever done.  Pix added**

name: ryan heapy
text: Pizzaâ€™s great and inexpensive! But thereâ€™s no way to add extra cheese through the site, app, or even by placing a phone order!? I called and the person on phone said if I wanted extra cheese I had to make my order in person because he had no way to add that modification. This seems kind of ridiculous to me.

name: James Salce
text: Yummy pizza, good selection of toppings. I would say Blaze is the best "build your own pizza" joint. I recommend.

name: Angel Mejia
text: I walked in and it smelled GOOD! The inside is really nice :)

name: Brendan Ng
text: Got the wrong pizza.  Called in several times.  Blaze promised me a call back and never happened.   Very disappointed  in my experience.

text: Expensive. The manager big guy is rude. There was a huge spider hanging from ceiling

text: This place was not even busy in there dining room and staff here were taking way too long to cook our pizza which was only a one topping pizza, I just can't imagine whennit gets busy how long you have to wait to get your pizza done on time, â€¦More

text: Overall the food is good but it does have a little to much oil when it is cooked. Nothing a few napkins can't pick up.

name: Trent Hill
text: Thin crust style.  Great tasting Pizza.  Thebread nuts are okay but nothing better than a good piece of garlic bread or cheese bread

name: Richard Harris
text: I ordered from Blaze via postmates received no condiments such parmesan cheese, pepper flakes etc. Also ordered a salad no utensils provided. How did they expect me to eat my salad? Maybe they consider a salad finger foods. Pizza was average at best. The salad croutons were stale.

text: Looks like santa ana is finally getting some good pizza. While Pizza Rev is amazing, choices don't hurt. A big plus for Blaze is simply the fact that they are open later than most restaurants in the vicinity. Located in a busy area with a â€¦More
